_source.short_desc: Asset Essentials is a cloud-based CMMS platform developed to reduce maintenance costs, improve productivity and make smarter decisions
_source.long_desc: Asset Essentials is an industry-leading CMMS platform for smarter, more efficient asset and operations management. 12,000+ operations leaders rely on Asset Essentials to track maintenance work -- leveraging the solution's deep reporting, asset health forecasting and mobile and GIS capabilities. From work order management to preventative maintenance to asset tracking, this user-friendly platform empowers organizations to cut costs, improve productivity, and extend asset lifecycle.
_source.target_audience: Asset Essentials is a highly configurable platform designed for manufacturing, education, government (local, county and state level) and membership organizations (YMCAs and country clubs).

category_features.name: Color Codes/Icons
category_features.definition: A way to visually represent data where different categories of items are marked with different colors

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Asset Library
category_features.definition: Collection of all assets in the system

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipment, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Calibration Management
category_features.definition: Schedule the calibration of instrumentation and maintenance requirements

category_features.name: Maintenance Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule predetermined or ad hoc maintenance services and labor requests

related_products.short_desc: Web, on-prem and mobile solutions to help businesses with mapping, data management, predictive modeling, geocoding and more.
related_products.features: Integrated collection of GIS software products; ArcGIS offers unique capabilities and flexible licensing for applying location-based analytics to your business practices. Gain greater insights using contextual tools to visualize and analyze your data. Collaborate and share via maps, apps, dashboards and reports.

related_products.short_desc: Seeing your business data against an accurate map can reveal hidden patterns, relationships, and trends in your business.
related_products.features: Map Business Online - Visualize customers and prospects against an accurate map. An outstanding sales territory management tool. The perfect compliment to your CRM system. Easily import data from Salesforce.com, Dynamics CRM, ACT!, QuickBooks, or Excel. Map-based market analysis with driving time and distance queries. Mulit-stop optimized routing! Add custom business maps to your presentations and reports. FREE TRIAL! Replace MapPoint and BusinessMap with MapBusinessOnline.

related_products.short_desc: Improve communication, decision-making & engagement using map-based urban forestry software. Schedule your 2-week free trial.
related_products.features: Manage the risks & liabilities of your trees using effective, customizable urban forest data. TreePlotter INVENTORY by PlanIT Geo is the world's leading map-based advanced urban forestry software used by city foresters, arborists & tree care companies. Improve communication, decision-making & community engagement with easy access to real-time data including reports, work history, maps & dashboards, using any device. Schedule your 2-week free trial with a consultant.

related_products.short_desc: GovPilot makes GIS mapping technology accessible to all. Benefit from expert-level insights without the GIS expertise!
related_products.features: In its standard form, GovPilot's geographic information system  (GIS) feature illustrates layers of tax assessment data aggregated from state and county records over a Google base map. Many clients choose to add custom layers that harness information from internal databases. Displayed on the municipal website, the public-facing maps become a reliable source of information for citizens curious about their town's real estate market, public transportation depots and other aspects of civic life.

related_products.short_desc: Take your revenue to new heights. Sell and bill on one platform. Configure, Price, and Quote complex deals all on the world's #1 CRM.
related_products.features: Take your revenue to new heights. Sell and bill on one platform. Configure, Price, and Quote complex deals all on the world's #1 CRM. Unify sales and finance with complete visibility across the customer lifecycle from quote to retention. Give Sales teams and channel partners the necessary tools to quickly configure, price and quote complex solutions. Automate discounts, pricing, and approvals to maximize revenue and margins

related_products.short_desc: Easily capture, share, and take action on your location data from anywhere with Nrby's mobile-first enterprise solution.
related_products.features: Nrby's location intelligence software allows you and your team to digitize existing manual processes to improve the efficiency and accuracy of your data. Easily capture, share and take action on your data, all in one place. Created by veterans of field operations with decades of experience, Nrby is designed to be easy and intuitive to use by mobile teams, field personnel, contractors and managers on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

related_products.short_desc: Carto is an open-source, cloud based Location Intelligence platform enabling users to gain insight by visualizing and analyzing data.
related_products.features: The Carto platform empowers everyone, from business analysts to data scientists, to turn location data into business outcomes. Our open, cloud software offers visual insights on where things happen, why they happen and predict what will happen in the future. We accelerate innovation, find efficiencies, power new use cases and disrupt business models through the use of Location Intelligence. Carto combines spatial and temporal data to power business outcomes.

related_products.short_desc: Teams use Cartegraph software to manage every infrastructure asset, track work, optimize space, and make smart, data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Government agencies, utilities, parks, and educational institutions tap into Cartegraph's asset management, work order management, and space management software to better manage their assets, track work, optimize space, and spend smarter. 

Cartegraph's easy-to-use solutions and mobile apps offer the most comprehensive, location-centric platform to manage every infrastructure asset: indoors, outdoors, above and below ground.

related_products.short_desc: GIS based Enterprise Real-Time Water Operations Mgmt. for CMMS, Asset Management, Billing, Inventory, IoT pipe monitoring and more.
related_products.features: Using the latest cloud based technology, and  the latest GIS tools, GeoViewer unifies many field and operational processes to help manage back office to field operations. GeoViewer's advanced technology allows field staff to view, analyze and collect data in real-time or offline without ever having to worry about lost work.   GeoViewer offers solutions for Billing, Inventory, CMMS, IoT, and GIS Analysis, and predictive modeling.  GeoViewer can also integrate with many legacy systems.

related_products.short_desc: BOSS811 cloud based ticket management for managing excavation requests, including 811 Once Call and integrates with most GIS apps.
related_products.features: BOSS811 is Cloud based One Call Ticket Management Solution for the Damage Prevention Industry. BOSS811 increases efficiency, reduces cost, is easy to use, and interoperates with GIS Solutions to enable Municipalities, Utilities and Locators manage excavation requests. With BOSS811 GIS mapping the various utility overlays can be displayed on the maps. This capability provides a visual indication of how utility infrastructure might be impacted by any new excavation request.

related_products.short_desc: Easy to use GIS software for Windows desktop, laptop, and tablet computers.  Create, analyze, and publish spatial data.
related_products.features: Easy to use GIS software for Windows desktop, laptop, and tablet computers at the lowest price.  Create, analyze, and publish spatial data.  Many vector editing features plus data wizards to access freely available data from the USGS, US Census Bureau, and OpenStreetMap.  Also supports, GPS tracking, geocoding, routing, and navigation.  Easily map your addresses from Excel spreadsheets or csv files.  Highly customizable via integrated VB editor with access to hundreds of properties and methods.

similar_products.short_desc: GovPilot makes GIS mapping technology accessible to all. Benefit from expert-level insights without the GIS expertise!
similar_products.features: In its standard form, GovPilot's geographic information system  (GIS) feature illustrates layers of tax assessment data aggregated from state and county records over a Google base map. Many clients choose to add custom layers that harness information from internal databases. Displayed on the municipal website, the public-facing maps become a reliable source of information for citizens curious about their town's real estate market, public transportation depots and other aspects of civic life.

similar_products.short_desc: NextBillion.ai is a spatial data platform that helps enterprises tackle complex location problems and manage location data.
similar_products.features:
Maps were always built for billions of end-users, but not for the millions of enterprise like companies we work with. NextBillion.ai is bridging this gap by building a new era in the mapping ecosystem to help enterprises succeed better with targeted, customizable, scalable solutions.

NextBillion.ai is a unified spatial data platform that helps enterprises manage location data and adopt an AI-driven approach for every use case and geography.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use online GIS and web mapping visualization solution.
similar_products.features:
Easy to use online GIS and web mapping visualization solution. Annotate maps, plot territories, filter data, analyze data, route optimize, and more. Great for teams that need to manage and create lots of maps.

A low learning curve brings map digitization to all levels of an organization. Founded in 2009, Scribble Maps has been built off of direct user feedback.

similar_products.short_desc: Maply, is a super easy-to-use mapping application for visualizing and analyzing geospatial data.
similar_products.features:
Maply, previously known as Geolytics, is a super easy-to-use mapping application for visualizing and analyzing location based data, or geospatial data. It turns your location data into custom-made heat maps, radius maps, network maps and territory maps so you can see your data with better clarity. It helps you to discover hidden value and get new insights.

In addition, Maply provides advanced calculations, such as calculating Center of Gravity of locations and route Optimization.

similar_products.short_desc: Custom mapping solutions tailored to your needs with Maps, Geocoding, Routing and Elevation APIs.
similar_products.features:
Create a map that integrates seamlessly into website with Jawg Maps.

The Jawg platform provides enterprise-grade mapping services built from both OpenSource and proprietary tools, as well as OpenStreetMap data. 

Far from simply being a map customizing tool, Jawg provides you with statistics that enable you to adapt your product according to the needs of your users.

Take control of your maps: https://www.jawg.io/

similar_products.short_desc: Teams use Cartegraph software to manage every infrastructure asset, track work, optimize space, and make smart, data-driven decisions.
similar_products.features:
Government agencies, utilities, parks, and educational institutions tap into Cartegraph's asset management, work order management, and space management software to better manage their assets, track work, optimize space, and spend smarter. 

Cartegraph's easy-to-use solutions and mobile apps offer the most comprehensive, location-centric platform to manage every infrastructure asset: indoors, outdoors, above and below ground.

similar_products.short_desc: Pandell GIS is an easy-to-use Esri-based land mapping software that integrates with your land system to visualize land rights data.
similar_products.features:
Pandell GIS offers a complete land mapping solution leveraging Esri GIS technology to help energy companies manage land assets. It fully integrates with Pandell LandWorks, land management software, to create a visual representation synchronized to your land rights data. 

Pandell GIS can save man-hours by automatically creating polygons from legal descriptions, provides comprehensive analysis and reporting tools, and creates presentation-quality maps easily, even for the GIS novice.

similar_products.short_desc: BOSS811 cloud based ticket management for managing excavation requests, including 811 Once Call and integrates with most GIS apps.
similar_products.features: BOSS811 is Cloud based One Call Ticket Management Solution for the Damage Prevention Industry. BOSS811 increases efficiency, reduces cost, is easy to use, and interoperates with GIS Solutions to enable Municipalities, Utilities and Locators manage excavation requests. With BOSS811 GIS mapping the various utility overlays can be displayed on the maps. This capability provides a visual indication of how utility infrastructure might be impacted by any new excavation request.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve communication, decision-making & engagement using map-based urban forestry software. Schedule your 2-week free trial.
similar_products.features: Manage the risks & liabilities of your trees using effective, customizable urban forest data. TreePlotter INVENTORY by PlanIT Geo is the world's leading map-based advanced urban forestry software used by city foresters, arborists & tree care companies. Improve communication, decision-making & community engagement with easy access to real-time data including reports, work history, maps & dashboards, using any device. Schedule your 2-week free trial with a consultant.

similar_products.short_desc: A data management and AI analytics platform for transforming visual inspection data into actionable insights
similar_products.features: Optelos is an integrated data management and AI analytics platform that transforms visual and sensor asset inspection data into actionable insights. Our patented technology geolocates and correlates visual and sensor inspection data from multiple sources into an intuitive, searchable and contextualized database ready for AI implementation, detailed analysis, advanced image modeling and enterprise systems integration. Optelos enables asset inspection program automation and improved data leverage.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use GIS software for Windows desktop, laptop, and tablet computers.  Create, analyze, and publish spatial data.
similar_products.features: Easy to use GIS software for Windows desktop, laptop, and tablet computers at the lowest price.  Create, analyze, and publish spatial data.  Many vector editing features plus data wizards to access freely available data from the USGS, US Census Bureau, and OpenStreetMap.  Also supports, GPS tracking, geocoding, routing, and navigation.  Easily map your addresses from Excel spreadsheets or csv files.  Highly customizable via integrated VB editor with access to hundreds of properties and methods.

similar_products.short_desc: Fielda is a Low-Code and Easy to use Mobile Data Collection and Workflow management platform built specifically for field activity.
similar_products.features: Fielda is a Low-Code and Easy to use Mobile Data Collection and Workflow management platform built specifically for field activity. Our proprietary Geospatial Software (GIS) Maps can speed up mobile data collection and provide in-depth insights. Whether your organization is doing Field Asset inspection, Device Installation projects, or simple data collection, Fielda can help you stay on schedule, share data, eliminate errors, and maintain inspection compliance.

similar_products.short_desc: ETAP GIS allows you to build existing transmission networks directly in ETAP using data from sources like OpenStreetMaps.
similar_products.features: ETAP GIS provides owners, operators, and planners tools to better design, analyze, and expand their electrical networks. It can include transmission, sub-transmission and distribution networks in the same electrical model and solve the combined networks. ETAP GIS can include detailed substation layouts, individual tower configuration, and generation plant details using a geospatial layout. https://etap.com/product/gis-for-electric

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 3D CAD Software software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 3D CAD Software tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 3D CAD (computer aided design) software assists in the creation of 3D drawings for manufacturing, engineering, 3D printing, and architecture. 3D CAD software is related to 3D Architecture and Architectural CAD software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Engineering CAD software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Engineering CAD tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Engineering CAD (Computer Aided Design) software assists engineers in designing and drafting parts, products, and structures that can be done in two or three dimensions. CAD software usually allows solid and surface modeling, rotations in three dimensions, and dynamic mathematic modeling.

related_products.short_desc: Fully customizable cloud-based maintenance management platform with iOS and Android apps for full maintenance tracking and reporting.
related_products.features: The industry's most customizable and flexible asset tracking platform makes planning and executing your entire maintenance management process easy. Asset Panda's custom fields, workflows, notifications and reports enable you to generate work orders, track maintenance activity, keep detailed historical data, and keep everyone in the loop. Plus, our cloud-based solution is designed for mobile and desktop devices you already own so your entire organization will have access anytime, anywhere.

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Maintenance Management Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's is the #1 tool for Maintenance Management. Get a modern, user-friendly solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before. 100% Free Download and Signup.

related_products.short_desc: CMMS software for managing service tickets, costs, and vendors. Expert assistance for quick adoption. Free 15 days  trial!
related_products.features: Our leading maintenance management software enables you to track maintenance costs, schedule services, manage vendors, and customize alerts for greater control. This CMMS software includes a mobile app to scan QR Code and Barcode labels and manage service tickets on the go. Full maintenance histories and actionable service reports make this a must have for all your preventive maintenance needs. Seamless integration RFID and Zendesk. Free 15 day trial!

related_products.short_desc: The fastest, easiest, and highest value maintenance software to automate everything from first customer contact to getting paid.
related_products.features: mHelpDesk is the #1 easiest and most powerful software solution for your maintenance business, automating everything from first customer contact all the way to getting paid. We provide our customers with mobile and online tools that are unmatched in performance, reliability, and functionality. We've packed the best tools into one extremely easy-to-use and affordable package that requires no big upfront investment. And we have in-house product experts to get you up and running immediately.

related_products.short_desc: Fiix's CMMS software helps you boost efficiency and asset performance by optimizing maintenance planning, tracking, and measurement.
related_products.features: Fiix's cloud-based maintenance management software is the easiest way to plan, track, and optimize maintenance. Fiix partners with you to organize assets and inventory, manage work, connect to business systems, and make data-driven decisions. Use customizable dashboards to see all your work, parts, costs, schedules, and KPIs in one place with just a few clicks. Our technician-focused desktop and mobile apps help you schedule, prioritize, and be notified of tasks from anywhere-even when offline.

related_products.short_desc: An open-source suite of integrated apps to manage CRM, PoS, Website, eCommerce, Sales, Accounting, Warehouse, HR, Marketing, and more.
related_products.features: Odoo is a fully integrated, customizable, open-source software packed with expertly designed, user-friendly business applications. Odoo's intuitive database is able to meet a majority of business needs, such as CRM, Sales, Project, Manufacturing, Inventory, and Accounting, just to name a few. Odoo is an all-in-one software solution designed to meet the needs of any company, regardless of size (or budget).

related_products.short_desc: The eSPACE Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market!
related_products.features:
eSPACE has best-in-class customer service and ongoing development support, Our Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market! Some of our key features includes:

- Work Orders and Assignments & Inventory Control
- Robust Reporting Options & Equipment Tracking
- Preventive Maintenance
- Vendor Portal

Take us on a free test drive for 30 days or request a free demo today!

related_products.short_desc: FMX's maintenance management software streamlines processes, increases asset productivity, and turns actionable insights into results.
related_products.features: Get ahead of your operations with smart maintenance management software. FMX is the most reviewed, highest-rated software on the market. Access maintenance from a mobile device and view tasks on a calendar or interactive floor plan. When servicing equipment, access step-by-step inspection and service checklists on the go by scanning QR codes on equipment with your mobile device. Receive low-inventory alerts, and track your team and equipment performance with configurable reports and dashboards.

related_products.short_desc: Applicable for most industries, Hippo CMMS is a powerful, affordable, and user-friendly web-based maintenance management solution.
related_products.features: Hippo CMMS is a powerful, affordable, and user-friendly web-based maintenance management solution. Its flexible platform and essential CMMS features suit a variety of industry needs, from manufacturing to healthcare hospitality to education and more. Hippo makes the complex simple with its graphical interface, and friendly support team. With over ten years of experience, Hippo has been instrumental in streamlining maintenance operations for hundreds of organizations.

related_products.short_desc: The app for trade contractors & service businesses to cut paperwork, provide amazing service, and run a more productive business.
related_products.features:
ServiceM8 is the app for trade contractors & service businesses, such as plumbing, electrical, HVAC & refrigeration, locksmiths, cleaners & gardeners - any kind of small business which manages jobs & staff in the field.

We're a job, staff & client management solution, with everything to run your day-to-day in one place - digital job cards, scheduling, quotes, staff locations, client emails & texts, job notes & photos, online bookings, forms, asset management, invoicing & payments.

related_products.short_desc: MaintainX is mobile-first work order and procedure digitization software that increases efficiency and real-time insights. Easy to use!
related_products.features:

MaintainX helps businesses track reactive and preventive maintenance, and control the daily operations, such as safety inspections, quality inspections, and operating checklists-all with a digital audit trail

Use customizable dashboards to see all your work, parts, costs, schedules, and KPIs in one place with just a few clicks. Our technician-focused desktop and mobile apps help you schedule, prioritize, and be notified of tasks from anywhere-even when offline.

Better parts management, extremely detailed repair histories, total shop transparency, and more efficient techs are just the tip of the robust features on offer. similar_products.short_desc: Empowering facilities management teams for over 30 years with powerful asset management and maintenance solutions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Aviation Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Aviation Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Aviation Maintenance software enables aircraft owners to manage their fleets, schedule maintenance work and track records. Aviation Maintenance software automates the documentation of maintenance logs that are required to prove compliance with industry regulations. These solutions can also serve as a way to manage component ordering and as a repository for maintenance manuals. Aviation Maintenance solutions also often provide features to log pilot and aircraft hours. Aviation Maintenance software is related to Equipment Maintenance software and Maintenance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Building Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Building Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Building Maintenance software manages business operations for service providers catering to the general upkeep of facilities. These applications help manage appointment scheduling, service call details, dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They offer such features as customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, job location mapping tools and also integrate traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. Building Maintenance software is related to Facility Management software, Maintenance Management software, Mobile software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top CMMS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of CMMS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: CMMS software, also known as a Computerized Maintenance Management System, streamlines maintenance processes, management and planning, helping organizations ensure consistent performance and increased efficiency. By automating and monitoring maintenance schedules, CMMS applications reduce costs and optimize the process of repair and replacement of vital equipment. CMMS software is related to Calibration Management software, Equipment Maintenance software and Maintenance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Equipment Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Equipment Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Equipment Maintenance software automates the process of managing equipment history and maintenance records. These applications help manage inbound service calls, schedule appointments, and provide dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They also offer features like customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, job location mapping tools and they integrate traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. Equipment Maintenance software is related to Building Maintenance software, Facility Management software, Field Service Management software, Mobile software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Field Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Field Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Field Service Management software enables organizations to manage resources and communicate with field employees. Field Service Management systems enhance productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. They improve the customer experience by giving field personnel access to service histories, mapping services, scheduling tools and to the organization's knowledge base resources. Field Service Management software is related to Maintenance Management software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fleet Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fleet Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fleet Maintenance software concentrates on repairs and the preventive maintenance aspect of managing business vehicles. Maintenance schedules, work orders, vehicle lifespan tracking, parts management, service records, etc. are typical functions for this type of software. Fleet Maintenance functionality would often be included as part of a more comprehensive Fleet Management package. For related solutions see also Aviation Maintenance, Equipment Maintenance, Maintenance Management, and Trucking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Service Dispatch software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Service Dispatch tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Service Dispatch software assists with the scheduling and dispatching of field personnel. Service Dispatch applications enhance efficiency and productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. Service Dispatch solutions also provide field personnel with access to service histories, contracts, mapping services, job management and scheduling tools, expediting work orders and reducing downtime. Service Dispatch software is related to Field Service Management software and Maintenance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Work Order software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Work Order tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Work Order software often comes as a feature or an add on to more comprehensive Field Service Management, Service Dispatch, and Maintenance Management software systems. However, there are also stand along applications. Work Order software schedules, tracks, and reports on service requests, helps dispatch technicians to jobs, identifies overdue requests, and tracks completion time and quality of service. Some applications also allow invoicing for specific work orders. This type of software is used to automate work assignment for building and fleet maintenance crews, as well as various filed service businesses.

_source.features_tokenized_text: asset_tracking billing_&_invoicing mobile_access predictive_maintenance preventive_maintenance scheduling service_history technician_management work_order_management
